reporter_caption.center: IN RE APPOINTMENT OF MEMBERS TO COMM., 2008-18 (Ariz. 2-28-2008)

caption.center: In the Matter of: APPOINTMENT OF MEMBERS TO THE COMMITTEE ON PROBATION

opinion.opinion_text:
In accordance with the Arizona Code of Judicial Administration ยง 1-108.J.1, the Chief Justice is responsible for appointing members of the Judicial College of Arizona. Now, therefore, pursuant to Article VI, Section 3, of the Arizona Constitution,
IT IS ORDERED that the following individuals are appointed as members of the Judicial College of Arizona for terms beginning upon entry of this Order and ending as set out below: Reappointments New Appointments Honorable W. Scott Bales Honorable Michelle Lue Sang Term Expires: December 31, 2010 Term Expires: December 31, 2009 Honorable Eddward J. Ballinger, Jr. Term Expires: December 31, 2010 Honorable Danna Hendrix Term Expires: December 31, 2010 Honorable Richard M. Smith Term Expires: December 31, 2010
IT IS FURTHER ORDERED that the Honorable Michelle Lue Sang is appointed Dean and the Honorable Eddward J. Ballinger, Jr. is appointed Associate Dean of the Judicial College of Arizona for terms beginning upon entry of this Order and ending December 31, 2009.Page 1
